atk_abil: Normal Attack: Attacks an enemy by flinging a large golden coin ( Range, air available )
Skill Attack: Knocks back and stuns the enemies in front by summoning Genie of the Magic Lamp ( Knock-back Attack )
Special Ability 1: Scatters golds while moving
Special Ability 2: When operating Human's Secret Skill, the amount of gold given increases by 10 times by 5% possibility.
atk_abil_sr: Normal Attack: Attacks an enemy by flinging a large golden coin ( Range, air available )
Skill Attack: Knocks back and stuns the enemies in front by summoning Genie of the Magic Lamp ( Knock-back Attack )
Special Ability 1: Scatters golds while moving
Special Ability 2: When operating Human's Secret Skill, the amount of gold given increases by 10 times by 15% possibility.

buffs.description: When operating Human's Secret Skill, the amount of gold given increases by 10 times by 15% possibility.
buffs.name: Human's Secret Skill
